description:
This versatile brushed cotton shirt is smart and practical with an ultra-soft warm feel, suitable for hikes, hill walks and everywhere in between.
Made from a cozy brushed cotton, this flannel shirt is warm and functional. Available in a range of earthy colours, it has a regular cut and a smart casual style with a rear drop hem. Perfect for everyday use on the trail or in town.

It has one chest patch pocket, buttoned cuffs, and a covered lower button to prevent catching on a harness or hip belt. The tough and durable metal buttons are inspired by the history of mountaineering and their origins in Sheffield, a once thriving steel industry.
name: Rab Boundary Shirt - Mens
